feed.title: Minio Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Minio: Bugfix Release
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: unexpected credentials missing while passing (05/09/24)
  • remove references for MINIO_SERVER_URL (05/09/24)
  • add log-prefix name for specifying custom log-name (#19712) (05/09/24)
  • Revert "Fix incorrect merging of slash-suffixed objects (#19699)" (05/09/24)
  • fix: truncate Expiration to second when Add ServiceAccount (#19674) (05/10/24)
  • Fix incorrect merging of slash-suffixed objects (#19699) (05/09/24)
  • deprecate unexpected healing failed counters (#19705) (05/09/24)
  • pass around correct endpoint while registering remote storage (#19710) (05/09/24)
  • ldap-import: Add additional logs (#19691) (05/09/24)
  • results must be a single channel to avoid overwriting healing.bin (#19702) (05/09/24)
  • chore: use errors.New to replace fmt.Errorf with no parameters (#19568) (05/09/24)
  • upgrade to go1.22.x (05/09/24)
  • allow caller context during reloads() to cancel (#19687) (05/08/24)
  • grid: Fix a window of a disconnected node not marked as offline (#19703) (05/09/24)
  • Accept multipart checksums with part count (#19680) (05/08/24)
  • kms: add support for MinKMS and remove some unused/broken code (#19368) (05/08/24)
  • return appropriate error upon reaching maxClients() (#19669) (05/07/24)

New Contributors

  • @ChengenH made their first contribution in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19568

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-05-07T06-41-25Z...RELEASE.2024-05-10T01-41-38Z

entry.title: New release for Minio: Bugfix Release
entry.content:
Highlights

  • Major optimization in handling hung network disconnects, and related tests and hardening added #19719, #19605, #19741
  • Fix a medium CVE for information disclosure during GETs with conditional headers such as If-modified-since, if-unmodified-since #19810

What's Changed

  • Added decom test with KES using sse-s3 and sse-kms by @shtripat in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19695
  • Add usage cache cleanup and lower forced top compaction by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19719
  • Move /cluster/audit to /audit by @anjalshireesh in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19708
  • verify preconditions during CompleteMultipart by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19713
  • Consolidate drive health related metrics into single metric by @anjalshireesh in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19706
  • Optimization: reuse hashedSecret when LookupConfig by @jiuker in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19724
  • optimize max-keys=2 listing for spark workloads by @poornas in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19725
  • Re-add "Fix incorrect merging of slash-suffixed objects by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19729
  • Move /system/go to /debug/go by @anjalshireesh in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19707
  • Add more metrics to v3/cluster/erasure-set by @anjalshireesh in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19714
  • Fix struct names by @coderwander in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19513
  • Add logger webhook metrics in metrics-v3 by @anjalshireesh in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19515
  • fix: return quorum based error, temporary failures must be ignored by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19732
  • SFTP: Correctly inform client about unsupported commands by @olljanat in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19735
  • Added tests for IAM policies for bucket operations by @shtripat in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19734
  • Add PutObject Ring Buffer by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19605
  • Capture ttfb api metrics only for GetObject by @anjalshireesh in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19733
  • Tweak one way stream ping by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19743
  • Fix crash on /minio/metrics/v3?list by @anjalshireesh in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19745
  • fix: add deadlines for all synchronous REST callers by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19741
  • Add Veeam storage class override by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19748
  • Upgrade github.com/minio/pkg/v2 and other deps by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19747
  • add more deadlines and pass around context under most situations by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19752
  • Add ListObjectsV2 unit test by @poornas in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19753
  • handle racy updates to globalSite config by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19750
  • avoid calling 'admin info' for disk, cpu, net metrics collection by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19762
  • Tweak multipart uploads by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19756
  • Start callhome immediately after enabling by @anjalshireesh in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19764
  • Return NumVersions in quorum when available by @krisis in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19766
  • Fix build script to wait for server to come up by @poornas in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19767
  • Fix test scripts to use mc ready by @poornas in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19768
  • re-use StorageAPI while loading drive formats by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19770
  • Add cross-version remapped merges to xl-meta by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19765
  • xl: Avoid marking a drive offline after one part read failure by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19779
  • fix: reject ilm rule when bucket LockEnabled by @jiuker in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19785
  • Fix two-way stream cancelation and pings by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19763
  • test: add reject ilm rule test case by @jiuker in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19788
  • Fix race get/set system/audit targest to avoid race errors by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19790
  • usage of deadline conn at Accept() breaks websocket by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19789
  • Add sufficient deadlines and countermeasures to handle hung node scenario by @shtripat in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19688
  • fix list results returned for spark max-keys=2 listing by @poornas in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19791
  • remove errant logs for disconnected remote by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19793
  • Disallow ExpiredObjectAllVersions with object lock by @krisis in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19792
  • Add cluster and bucket replication metrics in metrics-v3 by @anjalshireesh in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19546
  • Add multipart combination to xl-meta by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19780
  • move windows runners to in-house by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19800
  • Change endpoint of v3 notification metrics by @anjalshireesh in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19804
  • Use point in time values for gauge metrics in graphs by @shtripat in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19690
  • Upgrade madmin-go to v3.0.52 by @anjalshireesh in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19798
  • Add cluster config metrics in metrics-v3 by @anjalshireesh in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19507
  • compute time spent in ILM properly by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19806
  • Add cluster scanner metrics in metrics-v3 by @anjalshireesh in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19517
  • ldap: Add user DN attributes list config param by @donatello in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19758
  • fix: authenticate LDAP via actual DN instead of normalized DN by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19805
  • fix: information disclosure bug in preconditions GET by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19810

New Contributors

  • @coderwander made their first contribution in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19513

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-05-10T01-41-38Z...RELEASE.2024-05-27T19-17-46Z

entry.title: New release for Minio: Bugfix Release
entry.content:
Internal IDP: Potentially breaking change

  • This release introduces a change to restrict usernames and group names in the internal IDP - these names cannot contain = and , characters.

What's Changed

  • feat:support tags for PostPolicy upload by @jiuker in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19816
  • chore: upgrade deps by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19819
  • Restrict access keys for users and groups to not allow '=' or ',' by @taran-p in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19749
  • policy: More defensive code validating svc:DurationSeconds by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19820

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-05-27T19-17-46Z...RELEASE.2024-05-28T17-19-04Z

entry.title: New release for Minio: Bugfix Release
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: hide prefixes for Hadoop properly by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19821
  • fix: correct parse the tagging error for PostPolicyBucketHandler by @jiuker in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19825
  • Fix flipped EcM, EcN in metadata header by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19831
  • fix: single node multi-drive must register local drives properly by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19832
  • fix: wire up ILM sub-system properly for help by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19836
  • avoid pre-populating buffers for deployments < 32GiB memory by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19839
  • change service account embedded policy size limit by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19840
  • heal: Remove .healing.bin when all ES drives are healing by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19846
  • Add xl-meta partial shard reconstruction by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19841
  • Add max buffering to SFTP by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19848
  • Add per connection RPC metrics by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19852
  • Add sizes to traces by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19851
  • kafka: _MINIO_KAFKA_DEBUG to enable sarama debug messages by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19849
  • fix: crash when audit webhook queue_dir is not writable by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19854
  • Update madmin by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19862
  • race: Fix detected test race in the internal audit code by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19865
  • Add trace sizes to more trace types by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19864
  • Check if LDAP User has attached policy before creating Service Account by @taran-p in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19843
  • Test proxying of DEL marker for bucket replication by @shtripat in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19870
  • Remove hardcoded override as not needed by @shtripat in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19868
  • race: Fix rare race detected by testing by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19872
  • fix: remove DriveOPTimeout for REST callers as they don't work properly by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19873
  • fix: log diskerror when detect the disk space failed by @jiuker in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19861
  • chore: update all deps by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19875

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-05-28T17-19-04Z...RELEASE.2024-06-04T19-20-08Z

entry.title: New release for Minio: Bugfix Release
entry.content:
Highlights

  • Supports LDAP public key authentication, enables it via SFTP refer #19833

What's Changed

  • Add LDAP public key authentication to SFTP by @zveinn in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19833
  • feat: support batchJob for windows by @jiuker in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19877
  • upgrade go-oidc to fix GO-2024-2631 by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19884
  • Check both given and normalized group DN on LDAP policy detach requests by @taran-p in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19876
  • simplify site replication multipart proxying by @poornas in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19885
  • Add ILM metrics in metrics-v3 by @balamurugana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19539
  • replication: pass checksum headers to replica by @poornas in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19834

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-06-04T19-20-08Z...RELEASE.2024-06-06T09-36-42Z
